contentrichtext.text: {{Primary sources|date=July 2011}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Rusted Root | image = Rusted Root.jpg | caption = Photo from a concert 2008 | image_size = | background = group_or_band | alias = | origin = [[Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania]] | genre = [[Alternative rock]]<br>[[Jam band]] | years_active = 1990–present | label = [[Mercury Records|Mercury]]/[[Island Records|Island]]/[[Touchy Pegg]] | associated_acts = | website = [http://www.rustedroot.com/ RustedRoot.com] | URL facebook = [http://www.facebook.com/RustedRoot Facebook] | current_members = Michael Glabicki<br>Patrick Norman<br>Liz Berlin<br>Colter Harper<br>Preach Freedom<br>Dirk Miller | past_members = Jim DiSpirito<br>[[Jim Donovan (musician)|Jim Donovan]]<br>Jenn Wertz<br>John Buynak<br>Ethan Winograd<br>Jason Miller }} '''Rusted Root''' is a [[Band (music)|band]] from [[Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania]] known for their unique fusion of acoustic, [[rock music|rock]], world and other styles of music, with a strong [[Percussion instrument|percussion]] section that draws from [[Music of Africa|African]], [[Latin American music|Latin American]], and [[Native American music|Native American]] influences. Rusted Root has sold more than three million albums worldwide. Rusted Root has over 40 tracks that only exist on rare bootlegs recorded between the years of 1991 and 1995.<ref>[http://www.setlist.fm/setlists/rusted-root-1bd62d08.html Rusted Root Setlists Collection]</ref> ==Current members== *Michael Glabicki – [[singing|lead vocals]], [[guitar]], [[harmonica]] *Patrick Norman – [[bass guitar]], [[backing vocals]], [[percussion]] *Liz Berlin – [[percussion]], [[backing vocalist|backing vocals]] *Colter Harper – guitar, backing vocals *Preach Freedom – percussion, backing vocals *Dirk Miller – guitar, backing vocals ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== *''[[Cruel Sun]]'' (1992) *''[[When I Woke]]'' (1994) [[Billboard Top 200|US]] #51 *''[[Remember (Rusted Root album)|Remember]]'' (1996) US #38 *''[[Rusted Root (album)|Rusted Root]]'' (1998) US #165 *''[[Welcome to My Party]]'' (2002) US #129 *''[[Stereo Rodeo]]'' (2009) *The Movement (October 30, 2012) ===Live albums=== *''[[Rusted Root Live]]'' (2004) ===Compilations=== *''[[The Best of Rusted Root: 20th Century Masters - The Millennium Collection]]'' (April 12, 2005) ===EPs=== *''Rusted Root'' (1990) *''Rusted Root'' (1992) *''Live'' (1995) *''Evil Ways'' (1996) *''[[Airplane (album)|Airplane]]'' (1998) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.rustedroot.com/ Official site] * [http://www.archive.org/details/RustedRoot Rusted Root collection] at the [[Internet Archive]]'s live music archive [[Category:American rock music groups]] [[Category:Jam bands]] [[Category:Musical groups from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania]] [[Category:Musical groups established in 1990]] [[Category:Live Music Archive artists]]
